About Our Smoothie Vision

Delicious Fruits

You can be 100% sure each smoothie is providing you delicious fruits and veggies without artificial flavors or added sugarsâ€”just how Mother Nature intended.

Ingredient Sourcing

We bring the Goodness Outside through our ingredient sourcing and community support. We believe in bringing goodness inside our products and goodness outside to the world.

Cold Press

Many juices on the market have been thermally pasteurized, which can affect the natural flavors of the ingredients. This is why we cold press our juice using high pressure processing.

Vitamins > Disease

Fruits such as mangos, bananas and pineapples are a great source for vitamin C, potassium, folate and manganese which helps keep your bones, blood sugar, and thyroid gland.

Customers opinions

Ensure you still get your daily dose of veggies, without having to worry about prepping and chopping, thanks to this veggie smoothie from Refresh. It contains organic vegetables, along with a great balance of carbs, fats and proteins.

These Drinks from Medlie come full of all the nutrients of a fresh-pressed juice or smoothie but with 90 percent less sugar. These drinks are also loaded with fiber from 4+ servings of vegetables per glass.

Get Our Recipes

These smoothie recipes will get your day started off right by packing in nutrient-rich fruit and vegetables, plus protein-filled yogurt and milk for an energy boost that will keep you going until lunch. And unlike what you might get from store-bought options, they prioritize actual produce instead of the juices, sorbets, and sweeteners that can add tons of sugar to your cup.
